channel.title: CVE Feed for Unknown -- Easy Affiliate Links
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Unknown -- Easy Affiliate Links

item.title: CVE-2023-0375|2024-08-02T05:10:55.576Z -- unknown -- easy%20affiliate%20links
item.description: The Easy Affiliate Links WordPress plugin before 3.7.1 does not validate and escape some of its block options before outputting them back in a page/post where the block is embedded, which could allow users with the contributor role and above to perform Stored Cross-Site Scripting attacks.
